name: Velvet Matte Lipstick
description: A luxurious, long-wearing matte lipstick with a velvety finish. Infused with nourishing oils for comfortable wear. Experience intense color payoff and a smooth, non-drying feel. Exclusively from Earth Puran.

name: Radiant Glow Foundation
description: Achieve a flawless, radiant complexion with this lightweight foundation. Provides buildable coverage and a natural, dewy finish. Enriched with hyaluronic acid for all-day hydration. Discover Earth Puran's commitment to quality.

name: Midnight Sparkle Eyeshadow Palette
description: Unleash your inner artist with this versatile eyeshadow palette. Features 12 highly pigmented shades in matte, shimmer, and glitter finishes. Perfect for creating day-to-night looks. Part of the Earth Puran collection.

name: Silk Finish Primer
description: Create a smooth canvas for makeup application with this silk-finish primer. Minimizes pores, blurs imperfections, and extends makeup wear. Lightweight and non-greasy formula. Experience the Earth Puran difference.

name: Volumizing Lash Mascara
description: Get dramatic, voluminous lashes with this intense black mascara. The specially designed brush coats every lash for maximum impact. Smudge-proof and long-lasting. A signature product from Earth Puran.

name: Morga Attar
description:
Mogra Attar by EarthPuran
Pure | Authentic | 100% Natural | Organic | Herbal

Immerse yourself in the timeless fragrance of jasmine with Mogra Attar by EarthPuran—a luxurious, all-natural perfume crafted from the delicate blossoms of the Mogra flower. Made using traditional distillation methods, this attar is 100% pure, organic, and herbal, free from any synthetic additives or chemicals.

Its enchanting floral aroma not only uplifts the senses but also offers calming and therapeutic benefits. Ideal for daily wear, meditation, or spiritual rituals, EarthPuran's Mogra Attar is a tribute to nature’s purity and aromatic heritage.

Key Features:

    Made from premium-quality Mogra (jasmine) flowers

    No alcohol, no synthetic chemicals

    Gentle on skin, long-lasting fragrance

    Cruelty-free and environmentally friendly

Experience the essence of nature—bottled with care.

Would you like a shorter or more poetic version as well?
